            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Batch> getById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   int id)
        Find Batch by id using get request and return status 200 - OK. If no batch found, return status 404 - not found

      • add

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Batch> add(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                Batch a)
        create batch with unique id, name, start date, end date, curriculum id, trainer id, co-trainer id, and return status 201 - created. If the request doesn't fit the parameters, it returns status 400 - bad request
        Parameters:
        a - Create Batch with unique id, name, start date, end date, curriculum id, trainer id, co-trainer id
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity

      • update

        @PutMapping(consumes="application/json",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Batch> update(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                 Batch a)
        Update batches' name, start date, end date, and return status 200 - OK If the request doesn't fit the parameters, it returns status 400 - bad request
        Parameters:
        a - Update Batch name, start date, end date
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity

        @DeleteMapping(value="{id}",
               produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Batch> delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                        int id)
        Find a batch by id and delete. Return status 200 - OK

        Returns:
